---

## Phase 2: Consolidation Actions

### Format Standardization
Converted all synapses.json to canonical format:
- `connections`: Array of objects with {target, type, strength (numeric), reason}
- `inheritance`: "inheritable" or "master-only"
- `triggers`: Array of activation keywords

### Strength Conversion
- "high" → 0.85
- "medium" → 0.65
- "low" → 0.4

### File Reference Fixes
- cognitive-load: bootstrap-learning.instructions → bootstrap-learning.instructions.md
- knowledge-synthesis: bootstrap-learning.instructions → bootstrap-learning.instructions.md
- meditation-facilitation: unified-meditation-protocols.prompt → unified-meditation-protocols.prompt.md
- microsoft-sfi: dependency-management.instructions → dependency-management.instructions.md
